pr_title: [WFLY-6660]: Allow to dump Artemis journal to file using WildFly Management API.

timeline.message:
[WFLY-6660]: Allow to dump Artemis journal to file using WildFly Management API.

* Adding an admin-only operation to print the data of a broker.
* Testing the data printed in safe and full mode.

Jira: https://issues.redhat.com/browse/WFLY-6660

timeline.bodyText:
This check is not enough, the test passes even with printData(dataPath, false, false); // ~ secure = false
but I guess we want to check the secure info is not printed and that is also described in analysis:


check that it displays the correct number of total messages and the correct number of message in the queue but doesn't display the queue infos.
timeline.author: jbliznak
